body:
# Problem

Using a dynamic provisioned cinder volume, when the PVC is deleted, PV entered **FAILED** status. It looks like volume detaching and deleting happened at the same time. After a while, I found my PV and volume eventually deleted. I feel obligated to post the issue I have met here.
# Version

```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"4+", GitVersion:"v1.4.0-alpha.3.61+f73c68440408fa-dirty", GitCommit:"f73c68440408fa507234c28dbb4b4d48735df56e", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2016-08-26T08:32:58Z", GoVersion:"go1.6.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"4+", GitVersion:"v1.4.0-alpha.3.61+f73c68440408fa-dirty", GitCommit:"f73c68440408fa507234c28dbb4b4d48735df56e", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2016-08-26T08:32:58Z", GoVersion:"go1.6.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
# kube-controller-manager.log

```
I0826 06:03:36.681789    1146 controller.go:450] volume "pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be" is released and reclaim policy "Delete" will be executed

I0826 06:03:36.686426    1146 controller.go:1131] isVolumeReleased[pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be]: volume is released
E0826 06:03:36.840736    1146 openstack_volumes.go:195] Cannot delete volume 06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5: Expected HTTP response code [202 204] when accessing [DELETE http://10.8.188.11:8776/v1/fba689ab76d44366ac463280bb51bfd5/volumes/06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5], but got 400 instead
{"badRequest": {"message": "Volume 06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5 is still attached, detach volume first.", "code": 400}}
I0826 06:03:36.840782    1146 cinder_util.go:127] Error deleting cinder volume 06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5: Expected HTTP response code [202 204] when accessing [DELETE http://10.8.188.11:8776/v1/fba689ab76d44366ac463280bb51bfd5/volumes/06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5], but got 400 instead
{"badRequest": {"message": "Volume 06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5 is still attached, detach volume first.", "code": 400}}
I0826 06:03:36.840800    1146 controller.go:1069] deletion of volume "pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be" failed: Delete of volume "pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be" failed: Expected HTTP response code [202 204] when accessing [DELETE http://10.8.188.11:8776/v1/fba689ab76d44366ac463280bb51bfd5/volumes/06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5], but got 400 instead
{"badRequest": {"message": "Volume 06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5 is still attached, detach volume first.", "code": 400}}
I0826 06:03:36.843695    1146 controller.go:670] volume "pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be" entered phase "Failed"
I0826 06:03:36.843713    1146 controller.go:692] volume "pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be" changed status to "Failed": Delete of volume "pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be" failed: Expected HTTP response code [202 204] when accessing [DELETE http://10.8.188.11:8776/v1/fba689ab76d44366ac463280bb51bfd5/volumes/06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5], but got 400 instead
{"badRequest": {"message": "Volume 06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5 is still attached, detach volume first.", "code": 400}}
I0826 06:03:39.198523    1146 reconciler.go:115] Started DetachVolume for volume "kubernetes.io/cinder/06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5" from node "jhoukube"
I0826 06:03:39.200263    1146 operation_executor.go:633] Verified volume is safe to detach for volume "kubernetes.io/cinder/06c4c4fd-a36e-49df-88f6-b4f93e32d0d5" (spec.Name: "pvc-94e36100-6b71-11e6-8eda-fa163ee4c2be") from node "jhoukube".
```

title: Race condition during cinder volume detach and delete
